sourcesContent:
import { Link } from "react-router-dom" import "./ReviewCard.css" function ReviewCard({ review }) { const { _id, book, user, rating, content, created_at, updated_at, likes = 0, helpful_votes = 0 } = review const formatDate = (dateString) => { if (!dateString) return 'N/A'; return new Date(dateString).toLocaleDateString("en-US", { year: "numeric", month: "long", day: "numeric", }) } const formatRating = (rating) => { if (!rating) return '0.0'; return rating.toFixed(1); } return (
{book.title}
‚≠ê {formatRating(rating)}
{updated_at && updated_at !== created_at ? ( Updated on {formatDate(updated_at)} ) : ( Posted on {formatDate(created_at)} )}

{content}

üëç {likes} likes üí¨ {helpful_votes} helpful votes
Edit
) } export default ReviewCard
